text:
RT @RepValDemings The second article of impeachment was for obstruction of Congress: covering up witnesses and documents from the American people.

This morning the President not only confessed to it, he bragged about it:
 
"Honestly, we have all the material. They don't have the material." http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1220017654825738242/pu/img/Y32wqlbbAhJhEgVH.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1220017654825738242/pu/vid/480x270/sudgjZwUFHfjwfRy.mp4?tag=10

What's "unrealistic" is thinking we will let fossil fuel companies continue to destroy the planet.

The outrageous greed of companies like BP got us into this crisis.

We are going to solve the climate crisis, end their greed and hold them accountable for the damage they caused. https://twitter.com/CNBC/status/1220004261809086466 QT @CNBC BP's CEO chides AOC and Bernie Sanders for their 'completely unrealistic' Green New Deal ideas https://trib.al/cO2Ld4W

That's funny. Jamie Dimon seemed fine with corporate socialism when his bank got a $416 billion bailout from American taxpayers. https://twitter.com/CNBC/status/1219968439806255106 QT @CNBC JP Morgan CEO Jamie Dimon takes on socialism, says it will lead to an 'eroding society' https://trib.al/kYF7f9U

More proof of the link between the #Maduro narco-terrorist regime and the Castro/ Díaz-Canel dictatorship. Dictator Nicolás Maduro openly stated that the Cuban Ambassador to #Venezuela should be a part of his Ministerial Council. https://twitter.com/jimwyss/status/1219380569647218691 QT @jimwyss Venezuelan leader @NicolasMaduro says Cuba's ambassador is "practically" another member of his cabinet. Says government offices should have an "open door policy" for Cuban diplomats. https://twitter.com/Gbastidas/status/1219374613316194305

I lived in an America where abortions were illegal. If you had the means, you still had access to safe abortions. It was the most marginalized and vulnerable people who did not. We can never go back to that time. #7in10ForRoe http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EHCEu-uXkAE1A1v.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1184591178295140354/vid/480x270/K0ZNjin51iIeVVYR.mp4?tag=13

Senator Schumer’s tenth amendment gives each side 24 hours to respond to written motions – not 2 hours as provided in Senator McConnell’s rules. This should be simple – people should have time to read what they're responding to.

RT @michaeljknowles “VERDICT with @TedCruz” is now up on Apple Podcasts! Each night, the Senator will head straight from the Capitol to our studio to give you a behind-the-scenes look into the impeachment trial and so much more.

Subscribe now (and leave a 5-star review!): https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/verdict-with-ted-cruz/id1495601614

Black and Brown women are leading the charge to protect reproductive rights—yet they face significant barriers accessing abortion care. My administration will empower their leadership and fight against the decades of systematic racism that has led to this point. #RoeVWade http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EO6qOboWkAApFym.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1220097035694673920/vid/320x320/0ILTq-dtaNl_tUU8.mp4?tag=13

#ILikeBernie http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EO5S3zWXUAEgJZL.jpg

We need to make sure our government and our economy work for all of us, not just the wealthy and well-connected. There are nearly 140 million poor and low-income people living in this country—almost half of our population. This is the central question of our election. https://twitter.com/UniteThePoor/status/1220069688518094848 QT @UniteThePoor A large block of the voting public will stay at home on election day if the issues that affect poor and low wealth Americans are not brought to the forefront. Help the #PoorPeoplesCampaign demand a #PovertyDebateNow by sending a letter to @TheDemocrats: https://actionnetwork.org/letters/demand-that-the-dnc-and-delegates-hold-a-nationally-televised-debate-on-poverty https://twitter.com/ewarren/status/1220067049289977866

Since Citizens United, the voices of millions of Americans are being drowned out by corporate cash pouring into elections. I'm proud that our campaign refuses to take a dime from corporate PACs or federal lobbyists, and I'm proud to have the endorsement of @StopBigMoney.

47 years after #RoevWade ensured women's control over their reproductive health, our message is clear:
 
We will not go back.
 
We will not rest until all women have access to the comprehensive health care they need and are treated equally under the law. https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/12220

Strong unions are key to solving the crises facing higher education. I am delighted to join @repmarkpocan in this effort to protect graduate student workers who are organizing for their rights. https://twitter.com/repmarkpocan/status/1220046828160389120 QT @repmarkpocan Grad students are workers, & every worker needs a union.

Proud to have @SenSanders introduce the Senate companion to my Respect Graduate Student Workers Act today to protect grad students' right to unionize.

Every worker deserves a voice in their workplace. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EJbSR_dWwAAQkF2.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1195360037637623810/vid/320x320/exDG4_UQ9Z1ZECTK.mp4?tag=13

After Ebola, Congress invested to prevent pandemics like coronavirus. Donald Trump tried to cut that funding. As president, I’ll fully fund global health security, research on medical countermeasures, and public health capacity at home to keep us safe and healthy. https://twitter.com/cnni/status/1219708171297677319 QT @cnni The United States has its first confirmed case of a new virus that appeared in Wuhan, China, last month, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced. The virus has already sickened hundreds and killed six people in Asia. https://trib.al/j5wteMF

Sen. Schumer’s eighth amendment will subpoena former National Security Advisor John Bolton, who has already said that he’s willing to testify about the “many relevant meetings & conversations” he knew about relating to Ukraine. McConnell should let him testify in the Senate.

47 years ago today, the Supreme Court recognized a woman’s right to choose in Roe v. Wade. To this day, Republicans are determined to turn back the clock to when women were dying from unsafe abortions. But we won’t let them—we must keep up the fight for reproductive justice.

The free press is never more important than when it exposes wrongdoing by the powerful.
 
That is why President Bolsonaro is threatening Glenn Greenwald for the "crime" of doing journalism.
 
I call on Brazil to end its authoritarian attack on press freedom and the rule of law. https://twitter.com/theintercept/status/1219776537651810304 QT @theintercept “We are appalled that Brazil’s Public Ministry has decided to file such a blatantly politically motivated charge against Greenwald, in apparent retaliation for The Intercept’s critical reporting.” https://trib.al/ZI176QL

Nearly half a century ago, the Supreme Court affirmed abortion as a constitutional right.

I am sick and tired of conservatives who say, "Get government off our backs," while telling women what they can do with their bodies.

Women get to control their bodies—not politicians. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EO6OZ23W4AIfeS_.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1220068163372666885/vid/320x320/Rf0h2rUv1a0qQMIX.mp4?tag=13

Senator Schumer’s ninth amendment eliminates an obstacle in Senator McConnell's rules and provides a vote on any motion to subpoena witnesses & documents after the impeachment trial question period. No further debates needed.

“Lo que el senador Schumer hizo hoy no fue sobre justicia, fue teatro político”, dice el senador estadounidense Marco Rubio.

Lea el comunicado completo aquí 👇 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EO3d1fAWsAEfKn4.jpg

Final thought tonight: every single Republican senator voted to block every single amendment for relevant evidence and firsthand witnesses. Let that sink in.

The American people deserve better than this. We need a fair trial. Not a cover-up.

Sen Rubio, @SenRickScott, & @RepTedDeutch urged @POTUS to continue prioritizing the release of all U.S. citizens currently held hostage by Tehran’s regime. Specifically, they highlighted Bob Levinson’s case, the longest-held hostage in U.S. history.

RT @ChrisMurphyCT 1/ It’s 2am, but it’s never too late for transparency. So, as promised, here are my behind the scenes impressions from the Tue/Wed impeachment proceedings.

58 new abortion restrictions were enacted across the country in 2019.

Laws like these are dangerous, regressive, and blatantly unconstitutional.

On the 47th anniversary of Roe v. Wade, we must continue to stand up for women’s reproductive freedom and protect access to abortion. https://twitter.com/MotherJones/status/1219966867151958016 QT @MotherJones On the anniversary of Roe v. Wade, states are scrambling to preserve it https://nytv.to/AvZm3

There’s an old saying:
If you have the facts, you bang the facts.
If you have the law, you bang the law.
If you don't have either, you bang the table.

Yesterday we saw a whole lot of table banging from Schiff, Schumer, et al. Unfortunately I expect to see the same today. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1220017071842627585/img/SoGbYITGIMDpOMY1.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1220017071842627585/vid/360x270/MOr0BOCdzQHCM37X.mp4?tag=13

Couldn't agree more!  Bring them home!

https://video.foxnews.com/v/6125239849001#sp=show-clips

Maduro y sus secuaces son directamente responsables del bienestar del diputado de la @AsambleaVe, electa democráticamente, @leon_ismael. León desapareció ayer tras denunciar públicamente al FAES y a los colectivos por realizar actos de terrorismo en #VZLA. #IsmaelLeónDesaparecido https://twitter.com/carlaangola/status/1219996874880552960 QT @carlaangola Me informan que el diputado Ismael León está en el helicoide, mientras sus abogados están afuera pendientes ante un posible traslado a tribunales. RT @HouseJudiciary The House came to fight for a trial that is fair to the American people. The White House strategy—hear no evil, see no evil, speak no evil—is an attack on our Constitution. #DefendOurDemocracy http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1220022620395134976/img/OgIc2evhMzL8_EPi.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1220022620395134976/vid/320x320/t0ppl74fFGpAW8to.mp4?tag=13

Today’s powerful presentation by the House Managers underscored the need to uncover the whole truth with relevant witnesses and all of the relevant documents.
 
On the evidence, Rep. Schiff asked: do we want to hear it now? 
 
To answer him: we do.

Over and over, Donald Trump promised Americans that he would not cut Social Security and Medicare.

He lied.

When we win, we're not going to just protect Social Security and Medicare, we're going to expand them.
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/22/us/politics/medicare-trump.html

Each morning our Chief Counsel Tona Boyd will be breaking down the previous day’s proceedings.
 
Last night, the Senate addressed this trial’s most fundamental question: will there be a fair trial? http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EO6bxWqX4AAmtEP.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1220083350548946947/vid/320x320/-t2ucv73-kzTrkho.mp4?tag=13

House Democrats had an obligation to develop their case and they failed miserably. Now, they’re trying to ask the #Senate to do the work they should have done. #impeachment #SenateImpeachmentTrial http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1220034621439664128/img/SwMXHj5UFH0VmDBq.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1220034621439664128/vid/360x270/KQvLDhzwvmqQJY3b.mp4?tag=13

Today, on the 47th anniversary of #RoevWade, access to abortion is under attack all across this nation—through state laws and the courts. 
 
We must protect reproductive freedom for all.
The more we hear from Adam Schiff, the more the GOP is getting unified against this partisan charade!

https://twitter.com/burgessev/status/1220101894196072448 http://pbs.twimg.com/tweet_video_thumb/EO6svu9W4AcBTaS.jpg https://video.twimg.com/tweet_video/EO6svu9W4AcBTaS.mp4 QT @burgessev Looks like the Senate just quietly passed a motion banning milk impeachment tweets after 5 p.m.

Immigration and law enforcement should be kept separate. Combining them only sows distrust and harms public safety. I stand with @ArribaLasVegas and @MALDEF. Las Vegas must honor its pledge to stop unconstitutionally detaining immigrants. https://twitter.com/ArribaLasVegas/status/1218310967496335360 QT @ArribaLasVegas Today, together with @MALDEF and Travis Buchanan of @CochranNational we sued the @CityOfLasVegas for unconstitutionally detaining people for immigration. #EndComplicity #CourageOverFear https://twitter.com/maldef/status/1218303537786032128

.@SenSchumer’s amendments shouldn’t have been partisan issues. How can we have a full, fair trial without all of the relevant evidence? Without documents or testimony?
 
We have a duty to the Constitution & the American people—we fail them when partisanship is put before country.

On the 47th anniversary of #RoevWade, let me be clear: we will not go back to a world of back-alley abortions. Not now, not ever. #RoeIRL http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EO5V1jDXsAAgKBF.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1220006232959987712/vid/480x270/6Cf7usJyfyWciZdN.mp4?tag=13

I don’t understand why some folks run as if the internet doesn’t exist.

Joe Biden helped sell the invasion of Iraq and spent years working to cut social security, Medicare, and Medicaid. He’s open to a Republican running mate.

Spin it however you want, but those are the facts. https://twitter.com/berniesanders/status/1219815261118902272 QT @BernieSanders Let’s be honest, Joe. One of us fought for decades to cut Social Security, and one of us didn’t. But don’t take it from me. Take it from you. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1218639016599396353/img/vYVVRK1jJm9zh4wk.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1218639016599396353/vid/480x270/jY01ly1enlvJJnjW.mp4?tag=13
Sen. Schumer’s 11th amendment allows Chief Justice Roberts – a neutral party – to approve witnesses & evidence that are relevant to the impeachment charges.

I've got a plan to protect our rights and ensure real access to birth control and abortion for all. #7in10ForRoe https://elizabethwarren.com/plans/action-to-protect-choice?source=soc-WB-ew-tw
Let’s be clear: the integrity of the Senate is on trial. The world is watching.

Mientras el presidente interino @jguaido continúa su gira internacional, el #SEBIN y el #FAES de #Maduro allanaron la oficina del presidente interino en #Caracas. 

No se sorprendan si el régimen planta pruebas falsas en contra del Pres. Guaidó y miembros de su equipo. https://twitter.com/FabiiRosales/status/1219722648248291334 QT @FabiiRosales #URGENTE Alertamos al mundo, que nuestras oficinas ubicadas en el Rosal, Torre Zurich, están siendo allanadas, con más de 40 funcionarios entre miembros de las FAES, SEBIN y demás organismos de la dictadura.

And before folks jump in saying I’m wrong or that it’s more complicated than that, let me give you the receipts.

On Iraq:
https://www.vox.com/platform/amp/policy-and-politics/2019/10/15/20849072/joe-biden-iraq-history-democrats-election-2020

The way we beat Trump is with the largest voter turnout in the history of the country.

We win it with a campaign of energy and excitement.

We are that campaign.

RT @JulianCastro I said many times during my campaign that Democrats can’t lose their voice in the fight for the poor.

One reason I was proud to endorse @ewarren is because I know she will be a champion for not only the middle class, but also those who are struggling the most. #PovertyDebateNow https://twitter.com/ewarren/status/1220067049289977866 QT @ewarren There are 40 million people locked in poverty in our country. Yet, we've barely been asked any questions on poverty in the seven Democratic debates we've had so far. I agree with @RevDrBarber and @UniteThePoor. We need a #PovertyDebateNow. https://twitter.com/RevDrBarber/status/1219274794090319872

A reminder of what this is all about: any president -- any administration -- is justified in investigating corruption. 

And there was serious evidence of real corruption concerning Hunter Biden on the board of Burisma.

Pregnant women.

Uno de los más grandes tipos de robo en los E.E.U.U. es el robo salarial.

Up to $50 billion are stolen from working people’s wages annually.
